entities.name: filch
entities.description: Filch is the caretaker of Hogwarts school. He is mentioned as having sources and being self-satisfied.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a student at Hogwarts school. He sent a letter to Filch but claims it has gone missing.

entities.name: cho
entities.description: Cho is a student at Hogwarts school and witnessed Harry sending the letter.

relationships.description: Filch accuses Harry of not sending the letter.
Cho witnessed Harry sending the letter.
